subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that a Javadoc block can fit in a single-line and doesn't contain block tags. Javadoc comment that contains at least one block tag should be formatted in a few lines.

tr.td: Control whether inline tags must be ignored.
Specify block tags which are ignored by the check.
Control when to print violations if the Javadoc being examined by this check violates the tight html rules defined at Tight-HTML Rules.
